name: Cheek Chuk
description:
You are stuck in a labyrinth inhabited by the adorably aerodynamic creatures known as 'the Goeeys'. You hear heavy footsteps behind you. A foul beast has followed you in! You are far too weak to defeat it on your own. Perhaps you could throw something at it... or someone.

Controls:
WASD - Walk around
Mouse - Look around
Click - Pick up / Throw
Left Shift - Sprint

Objective:
Throw the Gooeys at the foul beast chasing you until it is weakened enough for you to do some serious damage. Don't let it catch you!
